concept.title: Retrieving all Trigger Definitions of an Organization

section.p: You can retrieve the trigger definitions of a specific organization as follows using the operator Web client:

ol.li: From the operation list, select retrievetriggerdefinitions and click select.
In the orgid field, enter the ID of the organization for which the trigger definitions are to be retrieved.

section.p: The details of all triggers defined for the specified organization are listed. They include the trigger key, trigger type, target, and target type as well as the flag specifying whether an action is to be suspended until it is confirmed by an external process control system.

conbody.section:
The syntax of the respective CLT command is as follows:
java -jar oscm-operatorsvc-client.jar <userkey> <password> retrievetriggerdefinitions orgid=<organizationID>
